items.title: How NTT Research has shifted more basic R&D into AI for the enterprise | Kazu Gomi interview
items.description: Kazu Gomi, president and CEO of NTT Research, has a big view of the technology world from his perch in Silicon Valley.

items.title: Windsurf: OpenAI’s potential $3B bet to drive the ‘vibe coding’ movement
items.description: A Windsurf deal would allow OpenAI to own more of the full-stack coding experience (and it would be its most expensive acquisition to date).

items.title: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash introduces ‘thinking budgets’ that cut AI costs by 600% when turned down
items.description: Google's new Gemini 2.5 Flash AI model introduces adjustable "thinking budgets" that let businesses pay only for the reasoning power they need, balanc...

items.title: New method lets DeepSeek and other models answer ‘sensitive’ questions
items.description: Enterprise risk company CTGT said their method cuts bias and censorship in models like DeepSeek.

items.title: BigQuery is 5x bigger than Snowflake and Databricks: What Google is doing to make it even better
items.description: Google ramps up the competition in the enterprise data space claiming its AI innovation help it to leapfrog rivals.
